meanings.sent1: The penultimate chapter of the book revealed the mystery.
meanings.sent2: The penultimate slice of cake was saved for later.
meanings.sent3: The penultimate player to arrive at the party found all the best seats taken.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, casting a penultimate glow over the horizon, she knew the day was almost done.
meanings.sent5: The penultimate step in the recipe was crucial for the dish's success.

meanings.sent1: The penultimate runner in the race crossed the finish line just before the winner.
meanings.sent2: The penultimate question on the test was the most challenging.
meanings.sent3: The penultimate piece of the puzzle was the key to solving the mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her penultimate attempt at the jump was her closest to clearing the bar.
meanings.sent5: The penultimate scene in the movie left the audience on the edge of their seats.
